alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 12:01PM EST until February 18 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing snow and localized whiteout conditions. * WHERE...Northwest Aroostook and Northeast Aroostook Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing and drifting snow will reduce visibilities to less than a quarter mile at times...especially over areas exposed to the northwest winds.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means that visibilities will be limited due to strong winds blowing snow around. Use caution when traveling...especially in open areas. Turn your headlights on so other vehicles can see you. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
